hero.paragraph2: We transform ideas into digital solutions.

homeText.paragraph: Your e-commerce ambitions fuel our mission at Develoci. We specialize in transforming 'what ifs' into 'wows' and challenges into breakthroughs. With Develoci as your partner, your digital transition becomes a rewarding journey marked by success.

platformsText.headline: it's more than just a platform - it's your roadmap to success.
platformsText.paragraph: Develoci is proud to partner with eCommerce powerhouses - Salesforce, Shopify, and VTEX. Our expertise spans across these platforms, equipping us to find the perfect fit for your business. Whether you need Salesforce's customer-centric approach, Shopify's user-friendly interface, or VTEX's scalable solution, we've got you covered.

about.headline: We will do whatever it takes to delivery beyond your expectations.
about.description: We are ecommerce certified specialists working for a long time as ecommerce development focused on ecommerce platforms such as: Salesforce, Vtex, Magento, among others. We have more than 10 years of ecommerce experience developing solution for ecommerce based on achievable deadlines, budged control, advanced solutions, scalable, and the best user experience.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.pageDescription: Founded in 2013, Fenix Studios was created in response to the quickly changing landscape of visual effects while maintaining a local presence.  With a compact and powerful team, Fenix Studios set out to create visual effects on a scale that was previously out of reach for a boutique facility, utilizing a modern pipeline that can quickly adapt to changing project needs.

homePage.title: Home
homePage.studyText: Fenix Studio invites recent grads to apply for an exciting paid opportunity to work with top artists, creative supervisors and production team in a real-live production opportunity during our upcoming Apprenticeship.

servicesPage.title: Services
servicesPage.text1content: The Fenix Art Department will intimately work with you on your vision – characters, creatures, environments, and more! We can help you build the world that you’ve dreamt up.
servicesPage.text2content: Our Artists will help you design and create your world no matter how large or small.

studyPage.title: Soluções Premium
studyPage.subtitle: Os treinamentos mais bem avaliados pelos nossos alunos para fazer você obter segurança, acelerar o seu aprendizado e aumentar os seus lucros estão aqui.

courses.courseDescription: Um outro nível de Consultor Financeiro. Aumente seu valor no mercado oferecendo um método eficiente e tecnológico em suas consultorias.
Torne-se um Consultor Financeiro Empresarial lucrativo e bem-posicionado em apenas 2 meses.

O guia completo para você começar uma nova carreira monetizando seu conhecimento sobre Educação Financeira. Tudo na dosagem certa, amparado em quase uma década de experiência dos nossos especialistas em negócios no mercado financeiro.
Conte com o apoio dos cérebros por trás da Empreender Dinheiro como se fossem Sócios do seu negócio e acesse uma metodologia que já acelerou o resultado de educadores financeiros em todo o país.
A formação de educadores financeiros mais completa do mercado. Formação técnica + formação didática + todas as estratégias de monetização que já utilizamos.

Ganhe destaque na Educação Financeira como um orador acima da média. Dominando a Oratória e Persuasão, você será capaz de influenciar pessoas, ativando no cérebro da sua audiência o desejo de dizer sempre “sim” para você.
Entender os fundamentos do Comportamento Humano é o caminho mais seguro para se diferenciar como profissional da área e garantir que o seu cliente alcance os resultados financeiros que espera.

platforms.headline: Specialists in the main platforms
platforms.description: We take care of all E-commerce development services, while you focus on the most important task - serving your customers better.

vtex.title: VTEX
vtex.description: Elevate your VTEX e-commerce platform with our certified developers and architects. They specialize in VTEX, delivering customized solutions that drive growth and enhance the customer experience. Choose our certified professionals to stay ahead in the digital landscape with a robust and scalable VTEX-powered online store.

shopify.title: Shopify Partner
shopify.description: Enhance your Shopify e-commerce platform with our certified developers and architects. They possess in-depth knowledge and expertise in Shopify, creating tailored solutions to align with your business objectives. Elevate your online store's performance and scalability with our team of certified professionals.

salesforce.title: Salesforce Commere Cloud Partner
salesforce.description: Enhance your Salesforce Commerce Cloud implementation with our certified developers and architects. Their expertise and deep knowledge of the platform ensure customized solutions that integrate seamlessly, optimize performance, and drive growth. Elevate your e-commerce operations with our team of certified professionals.

careers.headline: Be a develoci
careers.description: We are building a friendly, autonomous and remote culture and we are always looking for the best professionals.

1.title: Consultant
1.description: We're here to effectively scale your team up and take care of any technology challenges throught knowledge and experience from our consultants.

2.title: Squad
2.description: Whether you start a project from scratch or thinking about extending your existing squad — we help you build teams allocating a develoci team to your project.

3.title: Outsourcing
3.description: We have specialized developers for each e-commerce platform that can be allocated to your development team to help you full-time to achieve your project goals.

textGradient.content: Combining cutting-edge tech with a deep understanding of human needs, we thrive on solving problems. Our mission: to build eCommerce solutions that deliver lasting, impactful results.

contact.title: Let's talk
contact.text: Drop us a line, and we will come up with some well-fit options for your project.
contact.name: Name
contact.teamMessage: “As your dedicated project manager I am ready to guide your through development process.”
contact.homeComponentParagraph: Take the first step towards unlocking your e-commerce potential and achieving remarkable success. Contact us now to explore how our services can transform your business and propel you ahead of the competition.

testimonyList.author: GREGORY LIEGEY
testimonyList.text: Gregory Oehler is a Visual Effects Supervisor and 28-year veteran of the industry with over 90 feature film, television and special venue projects under his belt. A Flame artist since 1997, Greg has designed and executed custom effects for an array of films, ranging from Oceans Twelve  to Watchmen,  Contact  to Titanic, The Illusionist  to The Bourne Ultimatum, and Fantastic Four  to G.I. Joe. Along the way, Greg has had the privilege to work hand in hand with some of the industries top directors, producers and visual effects supervisors. Greg’s recent supervisor contributions include The Green Hornet, Pirates Of The Caribbean: On Stranger Tides, The Odd Life Of Timothy Green, Men In Black 3 and The Amazing Spider-Man.

testimonyList.author: GREGORY LIEGEY
testimonyList.text: Beginning his career as a composite artist specializing in look development and shot design, Greg worked for some of the visual effects industry’s top houses (ILM, Sony Imageworks and Cinesite among them).  Graduating to the position of Visual Effects Supervisor in 2004, he has served in that capacity on over twenty films during the past decade. In that time, Greg presided over the production of, quite literally, thousands of shots. Flightplan, Evan Almighty, Inglourious Basterds, Tower Heist, and Fury represent just some of his credits.  Overseeing work both on set and off, his range of experience covers everything from miniatures to full CG environments.  Greg has had the opportunity to work with many top directors, producers, vfx supervisors, as well as some of the industry’s leading technicians - each experience helping to fine-tune the balance between art and technology, essential to the creation of high-end visual effects.

testimonyList.author: MICHELE VALLILLO
testimonyList.text: With over 25 years' experience on over 50 feature films, Michele began her career as an intern with New York Women in Film and Television. Shortly after arriving in Los Angeles, she joined Cinesite Hollywood during its inception and soon relocated to London to launch its sister office in Soho. Returning to LA, she continued to produce for various studios including Universal Pictures, Rhythm & Hues, CIS Hollywood, Method Studios, and Pacific Title & Art. Michele's credits include Army of the Dead, Black Widow, Bird Box, and Scooby Doo, and was nominated for a VES award for Outstanding Supporting Visual Effects in a Feature Motion Picture for her work on Argo.

stickyServices.headline: Supercharge Your E-commerce Success
stickyServices.description: Fuel your e-commerce business with our comprehensive services. Our expert consultants provide tailored guidance to optimize your online presence and overcome challenges. Whether you need a dedicated squad or want to augment your team with specialized developers, we have the solution.

content.title: Consultant
content.text: We'll work closely with you to analyze your processes, identify areas for improvement, and develop effective strategies. From selecting the right technology platforms to streamlining operations, our consultants will guide you every step of the way. Don't let obstacles hinder your growth. Partner with us and let our e-commerce consultants empower your business for success.

content.title: Squad
content.text: Whether you're starting a project from scratch or looking to extend your existing squad, we're here to help you build the perfect team. Our expert consultants specialize in allocating dedicated development teams tailored to your specific project needs. We'll work closely with you to understand your requirements, skill sets, and project goals. With our extensive network of highly skilled professionals, we'll assemble a squad that is equipped to tackle any challenge. Don't settle for anything less than the best. Let us help you build your dream team and achieve remarkable results.

content.title: Outsourcing
content.text: Looking to accelerate your project goals and empower your development team? We offer outsourcing solutions that allow you to hire our specialized developers for each e-commerce platform, seamlessly integrating them into your existing team full-time. With their expertise in Salesforce, Shopify, VTEX, and more, our developers bring valuable skills to drive your project forward. By outsourcing with us, you can tap into our talent pool without the recruitment and management hassles. Experience increased efficiency, productivity, and successful project outcomes as our dedicated developers collaborate with your team. Don't let resource limitations hinder your progress. Contact us today and let our outsourcing solutions empower your team to achieve remarkable results.

qualityCards.quality1Description: Our team is made up of 13 people from different states and cultures. We are united in diversity.
qualityCards.quality2Description: We made enterprise level UX and human centered design our mission.
